EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Pivotal_Roadshow_Q216.Venue Change - Austin
EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal Cloud Native Roadshow - VENUE UPDATE
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the Pivotal Cloud Native Roadshow in Austin! We are moving this event to a larger space. Below you will find the new address:
Location VMware 6500 River Place Blvd. Bldg 6, 2nd floor Rudy's Conference Room Austin, TX 78730 Map & Directions <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/VMware+Technology,+6500+River+Pl+Blvd,+Austin,+TX+78730/@30.3958225,-97.8516196,15z/data=!4m2!3m1!1s0x865b338d330eb4d1:0x5eca7f9f066a522e]]>
Same Date, Same Time Thursday, June 30th 8:30am to 3:30pm
Website <[[http://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/austin]]>
We apologize for any inconveniences this may cause.
Please contact Peter Schmitt at pschmitt@pivotal.io <[[mailto:pschmitt@pivotal.io]]> with any questions.
